oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: That's How Long - Paul Craft performance - 1967
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of That's How Long, as performed by Paul Craft and published by Cedarwood Publishing Company in 1967. Words and music by Paul Craft
